prompt: Weight painting visualization on 3D humanoid character. Color gradient heat map showing vertex weights: red at joints (shoulders, elbows, knees, hips), transitioning through orange/yellow to blue at extremities. Character in A-pose showing clear deformation zones. Dark purple-black background with indigo accents. Professional 3D software viewport style, Blender weight paint mode aesthetic, clean technical visualization
